mapper.select: SELECT id,order_no AS orderNo,goods_id AS goodsId,buy_member_id AS buyMemberId,goods_spec_id AS goodsSpecId,goods_num as goodsNum,address_id AS addressId,batch_id AS batchId,goods_code AS goodsCode,tax_info AS taxInfo,buyer_message AS buyerMessage, status,created_time AS createdTime,type,address,person,phone,send_time AS sendTime FROM hsll_order WHERE goods_code LIKE #{goodsCode} limit 1

SELECT count(1) FROM hsll_order as a left join member b on a.buy_member_id=b.id where 1=1
and b.name like #{searchName}
